  Tendsto (fun t ↦ ∫ x in (0)..t, (arctan (Real.pi * x) - arctan x) / x) atTop (𝓝 putnam_1982_a3_solution) := by

  have h₀ : Tendsto (fun t ↦ ∫ x in (0)..t, (arctan (Real.pi * x) - arctan x) / x) atTop (𝓝 ((Real.pi / 2) * Real.log Real.pi)) := by

      intro t ht
      have h₂ : ∫ x in (0)..t, (arctan (Real.pi * x) - arctan x) / x = (Real.pi / 2) * Real.log (Real.pi) := by
        have h₃ : ∫ x in (0)..t, (arctan (Real.pi * x) - arctan x) / x = (Real.pi / 2) * Real.log (Real.pi) := by
          have h₄ : ∀ x : ℝ, x > 0 → (arctan (Real.pi * x) - arctan x) / x = (Real.pi / 2) * (1 / x) := by

            have h₆ : x > 0 := by positivity
            field_simp [Real.arctan_pi_div_two, Real.arctan_eq_arcsin, Real.log_one]

            <;> norm_num

            <;> rw [← sub_eq_zero]
            <;> field_simp [Real.pi_pos.le]
            <;> ring_nf
            <;> norm_num
            <;> field_simp [Real.pi_pos.le]

            apply intervalIntegral.integral_congr_ae
            filter_upwards [ae_restrict_mem measurableSet_Ioo] with x hx using h₄ x (by linarith [hx.1, hx.2])
          rw [h₇]
          simp [div_eq_mul_inv, mul_comm]
          <;> field_simp [Real.pi_ne_zero, Real.log_mul, Real.log_pow, Real.log_inv, Real.log_one, Real.log_exp]
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> field_simp [Real.pi_ne_zero, Real.log_mul, Real.log_pow, Real.log_inv, Real.log_one, Real.log_exp]
          <;> linarith [Real.pi_pos]
        exact h₃
      exact h₂
    have h₂ : Tendsto (fun t ↦ ∫ x in (0)..t, (arctan (Real.pi * x) - arctan x) / x) atTop (𝓝 ((Real.pi / 2) * Real.log Real.pi)) := by

      filter_upwards [eventually_ge_atTop 0] with t ht
      rw [h₁ t ht]
      <;> simp
    exact h₂
  exact h₀

  Tendsto (fun t ↦ ∫ x in (0)..t, (arctan (Real.pi * x) - arctan x) / x) atTop (𝓝 putnam_1982_a3_solution) := by

  have h₀ : ∀ t : ℝ, t ≥ 0 → ∫ x in (0)..t, (arctan (Real.pi * x) - arctan x) / x = Real.pi / 2 * log Real.pi := by
